analytic.description.consumption: The objective is to visualize the national level of cereal consumption. Which can be disaggregated at regional and departmental level.
analytic.description.market: The Market page shows the price evolution of cereals. Prices are collected in rural markets located in agricultural production areas.
analytic.description.production: Visualize the annual production statistics. Different combinations can be made by displaying separately or combining the production figures with the yield and / or seeded area.
analytic.page.title: Analysis and Visual Tools
bulletins.bulletin.title: Bulletins {year}

gis.departmental.description: The Departmental GIS Data displays only the indicators that have values at the departmental level. Indicators are listed in the drop down menus starting with the default indicator and users can use the comparison functionality to analyze two indicators at the same time.
gis.departmental.title: Departmental GIS Data
gis.indicator.name: Indicator
gis.regional.description: The Regional GIS Data displays only the indicators that have values at the regional level. Indicators are listed in the dropdown menus starting with the default indicator and users can use the comparison functionality to analyze two indicators at the same time.
gis.regional.title: Regional GIS Data
gis.title: Gis Data
gis.usage_text: Select the indicator(s) from the available options in the dropdown menus. You can also select the color scheme to display indicator variations where applicable.
menu.bulletins.description: Cette page présente les bulletins décadaires et annuels produits grâce aux contributions des membres du GTP.
menu.bulletins.title: Bulletins GTP
home.header.sub.title: Les informations décadaires sont collectés par le Groupe de travail pluridisciplinaire du Cadre National du Service Climatique.
home.header.title: Portail GTP sur le suivi de la campagne agricole au Sénégal
home.intro.text: Les informations décadaires sont collectés par le Groupe de travail pluridisciplinaire du Cadre National du Service Climatique.
home.intro.title: Portail GTP sur le suivi de la campagne agricole au Sénégal
home.presentation.title: Texte de présentation

home.newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
home.pane.agricultureAndMarkets.descript: Cette rubrique est renseignée par la Direction de l’agriculture, de la Direction de l’Analyse et des Statistiques Agricole et les entités de la sécurité alimentaire comme le SECNSA et le CSA. Les informations traitées concernent la production agricole et son impact sur les populations
home.pane.agricultureAndMarkets.title: Agriculture et marchés
home.pane.waterResources.description: Cette rubrique concerne l’ANACIM et la DGPRE qui interviennent successivement dans le suivi de la pluviométrie et la gestion les eaux de surface à travers le territoire
home.pane.waterResources.title: Ressources en Eau
home.pane.livestock.description: Cette rubrique est alimentée par la Direction de l’Elevage et le Centre de Suivi Ecologique. Elle fournit toutes les informations ayant trait au suivi pastoral (abreuvement, situation zoo sanitaire, alimentation du bétail, état des pâturages par le biais du suivi de la végétation)
home.pane.livestock.title: Élevage
home.presented.text: The AgriData platform aims to bring science to the Senegalese agricultural sector by providing key support decision information to policymakers while empowering farmers and other relevant value chain actors.
home.tabs.indicator.text: The Indicators page displays the alignment of specific agricultural indicators against the SDGs and the ones managed by the International System for Agricultural Science and Technology (AGRIS). All tables and charts will be automatically updated as new information is entered in the system. Users can use the date and the region filters to refine their search criteria. Click here
home.tabs.indicator.title: Indicators
home.tabs.indicators.source: Data comes from DAPSA, ANSD and FAO
home.tabs.market.source: Data comes from DAPSA, ANSD and FAO
home.tabs.market.text: The market page displays crop trend market prices collected only in rural collection markets located in agricultural production areas. Click Here
home.tabs.market.title: Market
home.tabs.microdata.source: Data comes from DAPSA, ANSD and FAO
home.tabs.microdata.text: The Microdata page displays agricultural databases that have been uploaded by each relevant partner organization. Users can use the platform analysis tools to browse and extract needed information from the available datasets that will be regurlaly updated as new information is entered. Click Here
home.tabs.microdata.title: Microdata

indicators.global.intro: This page displays the alignment of specific agricultural indicators against the SDGs and the ones managed by the International System for Agricultural Science and Technology (AGRIS). All tables and charts will be automatically updated as new information is entered in the system. Users can use the date and the region filters to refine their search criteria.

indicators.title: Indicators
initiatives.left.description: The organization datasets will display data groups by a respective organization. The table will be updated as new information is downloaded and will only show the 10 most recent datasets. Users can use the Search function to retrieve hidden dataset that have been previously made available.
initiatives.page.description: The Agricultural Initiatives page presents the national policies and strategies that govern and promote the sustainable development of the agricultural sector including projects and programs, studies and research documents as well as information in the agricultural sector budget. The page will be updated with studies that are conducted and as more projects are implemented in the agricultural sector.
initiatives.page.title: Agricultural Initiatives, Policies, Strategies, Programs
initiatives.rigth.description: The Agricultural Initiatives page presents the national policies and strategies that govern and promote the sustainable development of the agricultural sector including projects and programs, studies and research documents as well as information in the agricultural sector budget. The page will be updated with studies that are conducted and as more projects are implemented in the agricultural sector.

microdata.filters.keyword.label: Keyword Search
microdata.filters.organization.label: Organizations
microdata.filters.start_date.label: Start Date
microdata.filters.title: Filters
microdata.page.description: The Microdata page displays agricultural datasets that have been preloaded by each responsible partner organization. Where available, a given dataset will be displaying a link that will connect the ANSD data repository where users can consult reports, studies and other metadata related to a specific dataset. The site may also display non-official data sources that users can access by clicking on the links provided.
microdata.page.title: Microdata
microdata.sources.description: The links that are displayed in this section are non-official dataset or data sources and as such they should not be used in official communications.
microdata.sources.title: Other data sources
microdata.table.creator: Creator
microdata.table.datasets_description: The section displays datasets starting with the most recent ones. The table will be updated as new information is uploaded and will only show the 10 most recent datasets. Users can use the Search function or the Pagination options to retrieve hidden dataset that have been previously made available.
microdata.table.title: Title
national.indicator.chart.legend.bad: Actual value is behind target and/or reference value
national.indicator.chart.legend.good: Target and/or reference value reached / exceeded
national.indicator.chart.legend.none: There's no reference or target values to calculate indicator status
national.indicator.chart.legend.regular: Actual value is behind target value and ahead of reference value
national.indicator.name: Indicator
national.page.description: The National Indicators page lists the indicators which are monitored at national level by the various organizations, the latter being responsible for their entries and updates within the platform. The various graphs of this page indicate, for each indicator, a base and a target value which, together with the reference value, allow to measure the progress of an indicator towards its objective.
national.page.title: National Indicators
partners.list.title: Partners
partners.page.description: This page displays the list of partners that collaborated to this initiative. Partner organizations have been grouped by type to ease up the search functionality.
partners.page.title: Partners
partners.type.description: This page displays the list of partners that collaborated to this initiative. Partner organizations have been grouped by type to ease up the search functionality.
partners.type.title: Partners
